title: Things Seen in the Sky (Sora ni kakaru mono)
description: A posthumous edition of  a vertically oriented, rectangular, multicolored abstract woodblock print produced by the artist's son, Onchi Kunio (1920-2001); the original published in the Japanese art journal "Tsukuhae" [Moonglow], Volume III, no. 3, 1914 (Taisho 3).
dimensions:
paper: H. 28 x W. 21.8 cm (11 x 8 9/16 in.)
printed image: H. 13.7 x W. 11 cm (5 3/8 x 4 5/16 in.)
creditline: Harvard Art Museums/Arthur M. Sackler Museum, Gift of Elizabeth and Neil Swinton
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
